com.thesonofthom.tools

Class BufferMap.NullTerminatedStringField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractArrayField<BufferMap.NumberField>

          • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.StringField
            • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.NullTerminatedStringField
  • Enclosing class:
    BufferMap

    public class BufferMap.NullTerminatedStringField
extends BufferMap.StringField
    This class is for fields that are interpreted as ASCII strings that have an unknown length but will terminate in the NULL ('\0') character

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferMap.NullTerminatedStringField

        public BufferMap.NullTerminatedStringField(java.lang.String name)
        Standard constructor. Since we do not know the size of the field ahead of time, do not specify it.
        Parameters:
        name - - name of field

    • Method Detail

      • isValidAsciiString

        public boolean isValidAsciiString()
        Overrides:
        isValidAsciiString in class BufferMap.StringField
        Returns:
        true if the string contains all valid ASCII characters and the terminating null, false otherwise. return false if the string only contains the terminating null, so the NULL will print next to the empty string
